name: Garrison Street Tenements [Erweiterung]
atmosphere: A block of decaying, overcrowded apartment buildings. The narrow alleyways are filled with refuse and shadows. The sounds of arguments and crying are constant.
details: A shared, squalid washroom at the end of a dark hallway.
A fire escape that provides a view into dozens of miserable lives.
Graffiti of a strange, spiral symbol scrawled on many of the doors.
clues: A place where people disappear without anyone noticing. A breeding ground for desperation, disease, and strange new cults.
